alt.description: Alternative text description of the image.

crossorigin.description: Indicates if the fetching of the image must be done using a CORS request.

decoding.description: An image decoding hint to the browser. Sync for atomic presentation with other content, async,  to reduce delay in presenting other content and auto leave to browser to decide.

loading.description: How the browser should load the image. Eager loads the image immediately, lazy, defers loading until the image it reaches a calculated distance from the viewport, as defined by the browser.

sizes.description: Indicating a set of source sizes of strings separated by commas.

srcset.description: Possible image sources for the user agent to use, strings separated by commas.

style.description: Css style object to applied to the image.
